answers.answer: Hi,A missed abortion can be due to various reasons, like foetal defects and chromosomal abnormalities. Also maternal factors like TORCH infection and diseases like diabetes can be the reason. You will need a through evaluation to find out the cause.Also you need to take prenatal vitamins like folic for three months before attempting a pregnancy again. This will reduce chances of a mishap in the next pregnancy.The answer is based on information provided. Exact advice is not possible without a proper examination and investigations. You are requested to consult your Doctor. Take care and keep us posted.
